title: Low priority queue refreshing STILL NOT FIXED
body: Before a riot employee comes on here saying I have connection issues, I can play literally any title on my pc with 0 interruptions. My download and upload speeds are lightning fast and i was able to get into matches yesterday. This is just a bug you guys really need to fix. God damn, riot.

replies.body:
Having that timer reset on you is a pretty good sign that your connection to our servers was unstable somehow. Doesn't mean your internet is bad, but that's just how things go. It's not uncommon whatsoever to have a crystal clear link with some servers but not be able to reach others sometimes, it's due to how the internet functions as a whole with how ISP routes connections.

On that note, I'm curious as to if something is going differently with how your connection is usually routed. Run a traceroute for me for about 5-10 min to the NA servers at 104.160.131.1, that'll give me a good idea of what's going on to start with. Be sure to post those results back here if you want us to help out!
